mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Congressman Moore and Miss Norma Lee Kerns
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr. standing beside Miss Norma Lee Kerns of Moundsville, W.Va. Kerns was in Washington as West Virginia's representative to the Veterans of Foreign Wars (VFW) Voice of Democracy Contest.
